name: Devourb (CircleJam)
description:
Yo this was made in an hour

Controls: (Good luck remembering which is which)

Q: Shoot Red orb

W: Shoot Blue orb

E: Shoot Green orb

R: Shoot Yellow orb

Shoot your orbs to catch falling orbs to make your orb get more orby.  You cant win but it restarts if you get too small :D
